title: Email Digest Settings
description: Configure daily or weekly email summaries of activity on entities you follow, upcoming deadlines, and personalized updates.

schedule.title: Digest Schedule
schedule.description: Choose when to receive your digest emails.
schedule.dailyDigestDescription: Receive a daily summary every morning with yesterday's activity.
schedule.weeklyDigestDescription: Receive a comprehensive weekly summary of all activity.

content.title: Digest Content
content.description: Select what information to include in your digest emails.
content.watchlistDescription: Activity updates from entities you're following.
content.deadlinesDescription: Tasks, commitments, and tickets approaching their due dates.
content.unresolvedTicketsDescription: Open intake tickets that require attention.
content.assignmentsDescription: Tasks and work items assigned to you.
content.mentionsDescription: Comments and notes where you were @mentioned.

watchlist.title: Your Watchlist
watchlist.description: Entities you're following will appear in your digest.
watchlist.noEntitiesDescription: Add entities to your watchlist to receive activity updates.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.lookaheadDaysDescription: How many days ahead to show upcoming deadlines.
advanced.maxItemsDescription: Maximum number of items to show in each digest section.

savedDescription: Your email digest preferences have been updated.
errorDescription: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
